title: I need 16 RP RIOT!! <3
body:
Hey Riot! I've just bought myself Mafia Graves and I was meant to gift my friend. I'm 16 RP short off gifting my friend I was wondering if you could help me out 

IGN: XxSarge21xX
Server: OCE

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PgsA26Ee,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-04T08:29:28.107+0000)
>
> Send them a Ms Paint fan art.

hah i remember that. did that dude end up getting the rp?
Or you could not be poor and buy some RP.
Sure i'll just pull some money out of, uhhh... oh right, you don't just GET money
